verses.verse: Praise <S%H1984><s%> <S%H8761><s%> ye the YY <S%H3050><s%>: for it is good <S%H2896><s%> to sing praises <S%H2167><s%> <S%H8763><s%> unto our 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>; for it is pleasant <S%H5273><s%>; and praise <S%H8416><s%> is comely <S%H5000><s%>.

The YY <S%H3068><s%> doth build up <S%H1129><s%> <S%H8802><s%> Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%>: he gathereth together <S%H3664><s%> <S%H8762><s%> the outcasts <S%H1760><s%> <S%H8737><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>.
He healeth <S%H7495><s%> <S%H8802><s%> the broken <S%H7665><s%> <S%H8803><s%> in heart <S%H3820><s%>, and bindeth up <S%H2280><s%> <S%H8764><s%> their wounds <S%H6094><s%>.
He telleth <S%H4487><s%> <S%H8802><s%> the number <S%H4557><s%> of the stars <S%H3556><s%>; he calleth <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them all by their names <S%H8034><s%>.
Great <S%H1419><s%> is our YY <S%H113><s%>, and of great <S%H7227><s%> power <S%H3581><s%>: his understanding <S%H8394><s%> is infinite <S%H4557><s%>.
The YY <S%H3068><s%> lifteth up <S%H5749><s%> <S%H8767><s%> the meek <S%H6035><s%>: he casteth <S%H8213><s%> the wicked <S%H7563><s%> down <S%H8213><s%> <S%H8688><s%> to the ground <S%H776><s%>.
Sing <S%H6030><s%> <S%H8798><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%> with thanksgiving <S%H8426><s%>; sing praise <S%H2167><s%> <S%H8761><s%> upon the harp <S%H3658><s%> unto our 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>:

Who covereth <S%H3680><s%> <S%H8764><s%> the heaven <S%H8064><s%> with clouds <S%H5645><s%>, who prepareth <S%H3559><s%> <S%H8688><s%> rain <S%H4306><s%> for the earth <S%H776><s%>, who maketh grass <S%H2682><s%> to grow <S%H6779><s%> <S%H8688><s%> upon the mountains <S%H2022><s%>.
He giveth <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8802><s%> to the beast <S%H929><s%> his food <S%H3899><s%>, and to the young <S%H1121><s%> ravens <S%H6158><s%> which cry <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

He delighteth <S%H2654><s%> <S%H8799><s%> not in the strength <S%H1369><s%> of the horse <S%H5483><s%>: he taketh not pleasure <S%H7521><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in the legs <S%H7785><s%> of a man <S%H376><s%>.
The YY <S%H3068><s%> taketh pleasure <S%H7521><s%> <S%H8802><s%> in them that fear <S%H3373><s%> him, in those that hope <S%H3176><s%> <S%H8764><s%> in his mercy <S%H2617><s%>.
Praise <S%H7623><s%> <S%H8761><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>, O Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%>; praise <S%H1984><s%> <S%H8761><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, O TZiyon <S%H6726><s%>.

For he hath strengthened <S%H2388><s%> <S%H8765><s%> the bars <S%H1280><s%> of thy gates <S%H8179><s%>; he hath blessed <S%H1288><s%> <S%H8765><s%> thy children <S%H1121><s%> within <S%H7130><s%> thee.
He maketh <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8802><s%> peace <S%H7965><s%> in thy borders <S%H1366><s%>, and filleth <S%H7646><s%> <S%H8686><s%> thee with the finest <S%H2459><s%> of the wheat <S%H2406><s%>.
He sendeth forth <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8802><s%> his Mitzvah <S%H565><s%> upon earth <S%H776><s%>: his word <S%H1697><s%> runneth <S%H7323><s%> <S%H8799><s%> very swiftly <S%H4120><s%>.
He giveth <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8802><s%> snow <S%H7950><s%> like wool <S%H6785><s%>: he scattereth <S%H6340><s%> <S%H8762><s%> the hoarfrost <S%H3713><s%> like ashes <S%H665><s%>.
He casteth forth <S%H7993><s%> <S%H8688><s%> his ice <S%H7140><s%> like morsels <S%H6595><s%>: who can stand <S%H5975><s%> <S%H8799><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> his cold <S%H7135><s%> ?

He sendeth out <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8799><s%> his word <S%H1697><s%>, and melteth <S%H4529><s%> <S%H8686><s%> them: he causeht his wind <S%H7307><s%> to blow <S%H5380><s%> <S%H8686><s%>, and the waters <S%H4325><s%> flow <S%H5140><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

He sheweth <S%H5046><s%> <S%H8688><s%> his word <S%H1697><s%> <S%H8675><s%> <S%H1697><s%> unto Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%>, his statutes <S%H2706><s%> and his judgments <S%H4941><s%> unto Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>.

He hath not dealt <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> so with any nation <S%H1471><s%>: and as for his judgments <S%H4941><s%>, they have not known <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%> them. Praise <S%H1984><s%> <S%H8761><s%> ye the YY <S%H3050><s%>.
